item.description:
WESTâ€™s Panel Discussion: How to Market Your Ideas (And Yourself) in Business
When: Thursday, October 14, from 6:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Where: Pfizer (formally Wyeth) Cafeteria
200 Cambridgepark Drive (one block from Alewife T stop)
Cambridge, MA- free parking available
Register: http://www.westorg.or...
Success often requires presenting scientific and technical ideas (and yourself) to others. This can range from persuading a company of your work's value, convincing potential funders to invest, or getting upper management to take you seriously. This panel discussion, by the Women Entrepreneurs in Science and Technology (WEST), will address both "hard" and "soft" issues to better articulate and market your ideas (and yourself) to achieve your goals.
item.name: How to Market Your Ideas (And Yourself) in Business
